title.description: The title of the blog post.

slug.description: The slug of the blog post, generated from the title for URL-friendly access.

coverImage.description: URL of the cover image for the blog post.

content.description: The content of the blog post, stored as JSON (Editor.js format).

tags.description: An array of tags associated with the blog post.

author.description: The author of the blog post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the blog post was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the blog post was last updated.

uid.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was created.

/posts/{postId}.description: Represents a blog post. Authenticated users can create, update, and delete posts; all users can read posts.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for users. Each user can read and write to their own profile.
